attributes.action: Stop Russian agression towards Ukraine, Georgia and other ex-soviet countries
attributes.additional_details:
Occupation of Ukraine is the latest but not the least action of Russia that immensely violates international law. Putin’s regime is the greatest threat to world peace. It’s high time to say this and act in the strongest manner.
We, the citizens of the world, urge you to:
· Support Ukraine by all means and save this country from Russian occupation
· Support Georgia by all means and save this country from Russian occupation
· Remove Russia from G8 and G20
· Remove Russia from WTO
· Freeze assets and bank accounts of members of the Russian Government
· Cancel all international visas of members of the Russian Government and Ruling Party Parliament members and their families
· Expand “Magnitsky List” to other members of the criminal regime of the Russian Government
· Start investigation of Putin’s crimes against humanity and punish all the members of the criminal regime
Fulfill your obligations! Stop Russia!
